songs.title: School Globes (Demo)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: XXXTENTACION]
A one, two, three...

[Chorus: XXXTENTACION]
Ooh
Ooh, ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh, ooh

[Verse 1: XXXTENTACION]
I'll stop the world when I'm with you
Nothin' to hate, nothin' to lose
Put down the loaded guns, and socialize with everyone
I'll stop the war when I'm with you
So tell 'em, say

[Chorus: XXXTENTACION]
Ooh (Hey)
Ooh, ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh, ooh

[Verse 2: Lil Nas X]
Weight on my back with heavy news
Can't hide the fact, it made me loose, oh
We must tell everyone and maybe we can have some fun
And I'm thankful that you saw me through
And tell 'em, say-

[Chorus: XXXTENTACION & Lil Nas X and XXXTENTACION]
Ooh, ooh, ooh (Hey)
Ooh, ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh
Ooh, ooh, ooh
